text:
Lord Shiva sent his messenger named Pushpadant, to Shankhachuda to ask him to return back the kingdom of the deities to them.
 Shankhachuda refused to oblige this demand, on the contrary he expressed his willingness and readiness to fight lord Shiva.
 Pushpadant returned back and narrated the whole story to lord Shiva.
title: Conversation Between Pushpadant & Shankhachuda
